Sanitizer_MemoryData Struct Reference
[Sanitizer Memory API]

Data passed to extended versions of Sanitizer memory APIs.


Data Fields

CUcontext ctx
uint8_t perThreadStream

Field Documentation

CUcontext Sanitizer_MemoryData::ctx

CUDA context in which to perform the memcpy/memset. If ctx is NULL, the current context will be used.
